reviewText: With personal stories, humor, and biblical truth, Chrystal Evans Hurst encourages and equips women to rediscover and celebrate their God-given dreamsdreams that have been lost, stolen, postponed or minimized. The book that accompanies this study, Shes Still There, has made a significant impact in my life, reminding me of truths that have been buried by disappointments and others words and actions.
Very uplifting study for women, helps us understand and see we are not alone.
